title: Icon Draven Day Glitch
body: I gifted a friend an item and I participated in the draven box and i havent received my icons. Anyone else have this problem?

replies.body: Icons are still being handed out, and you should receiving them by April 25th.
I've only received one of my two icons. I still need the one for buying a legendary skin.
Yep, I haven't received either of my icons either.
Yeah I gifted a friend a skin, and bought a legendary skin for myself... have yet to receive both of the icons when the event ended... about to contact support if i don't get them by tomorrow.

> [{quoted}](name=Rcsss,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WEQVk00q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-14T02:42:58.188+0000)
>
> Yeah I gifted a friend a skin, and bought a legendary skin for myself... have yet to receive both of the icons when the event ended... about to contact support if i don't get them by tomorrow.

It can take up to 72 hours, maybe more for Riot to gift and send out the icons, there are a lot of username's to process through so you're gonna have to sit tight a little :)
